title: Congress to certify Trump's 2024 victory: Live updates
shortDescription: Four years after a mob of Donald Trump supporters attacked the Capitol, Congress is set to certify his 2024 election victory.

title: Daily Briefing: A new Trump era begins
shortDescription: Congress to certify election victory four years after Jan. 6 riot. Here is the news to know on Monday.

title: Will Trump pardon January 6 Capitol rioters? Here's what he has said
shortDescription: Donald Trump has promised to issue the pardons to Jan. 6 rioters “very quickly,” starting on his first day in office on Jan. 20.

title: What to expect Jan. 6 when Congress meets to certify Trump's victory
shortDescription: On Jan. 6, 2021, Trump supporters stormed the U.S. Capitol. Lawmakers expect 2025's certification to go smoothly as the Republican president returns.

title: Biden urges Americans to never forget the Jan. 6 attack: 'Cannot allow the truth to be lost'
shortDescription: President Biden warned that there is an "unrelenting" effort to rewrite, or erase, the history of the Jan. 6 riot at the U.S. Capitol.

title: President Biden sits for exclusive interview with USA TODAY's Susan Page
shortDescription: Susan Page, USA TODAY's Washington Bureau chief, exclusively interviewed outgoing President Joe Biden about his legacy, the 2024 election and more.

title: Judges block Jan. 6 defendants' requests to attend Trump's inauguration
shortDescription: Prosecutors have warned that Jan. 6 defendants attending Trump's inauguration could end up face-to-face with officers they attacked four years ago.

title: New Trump era to begin Jan. 6, four years after attack on Capitol
shortDescription: Four years ago, Trump supporters attacked Capitol to stop Congress from certifying his election loss. This time, the count is expected to go smoothly.

title: The Jan. 6 'shaman,' the congressman, the aide: Where are they now?
shortDescription: The Capitol riot four years ago turned life upside down for many of those who experienced the day firsthand.

title: To Antifa, Trump is a fascist. Will the movement riot? Commit attacks?
shortDescription: To the ant-fascist movement, President-elect Trump is a fascist. Antifa say they will remain peaceful as he takes power, unless lines are crossed.

title: Trump (reluctantly) picks former critic for foreign policy role
shortDescription:
Morgan Ortagus, a Donald Trump critic turned supporter, 
will serve as his deputy special envoy for Middle East peace.

title: How a raging mob took over the Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021
shortDescription: Monday's meeting to certify the election comes amid efforts by President-elect Trump to downplay the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol insurrection.

title: Biden awards Medal of Freedom to Clinton, Soros, Messi and others
shortDescription: Hillary Clinton, George Soros, Lionel Messi and Bono are among 19 people President Biden awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom.

title: Why Biden's surgeon general spoke out on alcohol before his term ends
shortDescription: The federal government is conducting an every-five-year review of dietary guidelines for alcohol consumption.

title: House Republicans gave Mike Johnson the speakership – and a warning
shortDescription: Lawmakers reminded Johnson they have the numbers to remove him from the speakership if needed.

title: House GOP lawmakers skeptical Speaker Johnson can pass Trump's agenda
shortDescription: Eleven House Republicans skeptical about Speaker Mike Johnson's leadership outlined what they expect to fulfill President-elect Donald Trump's agenda.

title: Mike Johnson elected House speaker
shortDescription: Republican Mike Johnson of Louisiana has been re-elected speaker of the House by a margin of 218-215-1.

title: NY judge upholds Donald Trump conviction and sets sentencing Jan. 10
shortDescription: Judge Juan Merchan upheld Trump's hush money conviction and set sentencing for Jan. 10, but said there would be no prison, fine or probation.

title: Mike Johnson re-elected House speaker
shortDescription: Rep. Mike Johnson won the speakership with the support of every sitting House Republican except for one, as he works to unite a fractured GOP party.

title: Mike Johnson reelected as Speaker of the House
shortDescription: Mike Johnson, R-La., is reelected as Speaker of the House in a divided Congress where he could only afford to lose one Republican vote to keep his job.

title: Biden commutes sentences of most on federal death row | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: President-elect Donald Trump says he will rename the country's tallest mountain, reverting to a former name. | The year in space exploration.

title: Trump fumes over US flag flying at half-staff during his inauguration
shortDescription: "Nobody wants to see this, and no American can be happy about it," Trump said of the US flag flying at half-staff during his inauguration.
